TextBlock.Text: CYCAD: Ore = or? This ore that? (No, not happy with this one.)
CYCAD: Wait, rock, rock bottom? Hitting rock bottom at the base of the mine? (Promising!)
CYCAD: Mining, mines, all mine? This mine's all mine? (Nope, when will I ever use this?)
CYCAD: Samples, core samples, core? Plan a-core-dingly? (This one's a winner!)
CYCAD: Geology, geological, geo, geo- (This is going nowhere fast.)
CYCAD: Rock = stock? Stockpile of rockpiles? (No, rubbish.)
